com.kuryshee.safehome.database

Interface DatabaseAccessInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseAccessImpl

    public interface DatabaseAccessInterface
    The abstraction of interactions with the database.
    Author:
    Ekaterina Kurysheva.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRpiAction(java.lang.String rpiId, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String action, java.lang.String level)
      Registers the action on Raspberry Pi into database.
      void addRpiPhoto(java.lang.String rpiId, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String name, byte[] photo)
      Adds photo to the database.
      void addRpiUserRelation(java.lang.String rpiId, java.lang.String user)
      Registers the user for the given Raspberry Pi.
      void addUserCredentials(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password)
      Adds user credentials to the database.
      void addUserToken(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String token)
      Adds user token for communication authorization with the token.
      void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection.
      void deleteRpiPhoto(java.lang.String rpiId, java.lang.String time)
      Deletes photo from the database.
      void deleteUserCredentials(java.lang.String login)
      Deletes user credentials and all data connected to the user from the database.
      java.lang.String getLatestDateOnActions(java.lang.String rpiId)
      Returns the time of most recent action on Raspberry Pi registered in the database.
      java.lang.String getLatestDateOnPhotos(java.lang.String rpiId)
      Returns the time of most recent photo on Raspberry Pi registered in the database.
      byte[] getPhoto(java.lang.String rpiId, java.lang.String time)
      Gets the photo from the database.
      byte[] getPhotoTimesBefore(java.lang.String rpiId, java.lang.String time, int numberOfDates)
      Gets the list of time stamps of most recent photos before the given date.
      byte[] getRpiActionsBefore(java.lang.String rpiId, java.lang.String time, int numberOfActions)
      Gets the list of time stamps of most recent actions before the given date.
      java.lang.String getRpiByUser(java.lang.String user)
      Retrieves information about user and Rpi relation.
      java.lang.String getUserByToken(java.lang.String token)
      Gets the user, which is identified be the token.
      boolean validateUserCredentials(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password)
      Validates user's login and password.
      boolean validateUserToken(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String token)
      Validates user's token for communication.
      boolean verifyRpiRegistration(java.lang.String rpiId)
      Validates that such Raspberry Pi is registered.
